    <span class="ruby-keyword kw">def</span> <span class="ruby-keyword kw">self</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">should_validate</span> <span class="ruby-identifier">validation</span>, <span class="ruby-identifier">options</span>, <span class="ruby-identifier">valid_file</span>, <span class="ruby-identifier">invalid_file</span>
      <span class="ruby-identifier">context</span> <span class="ruby-node">&quot;with #{validation} validation and #{options.inspect} options&quot;</span> <span class="ruby-keyword kw">do</span>
        <span class="ruby-identifier">setup</span> <span class="ruby-keyword kw">do</span>
          <span class="ruby-constant">Dummy</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">send</span>(<span class="ruby-node">&quot;validates_attachment_#{validation}&quot;</span><span class="ruby-node">&quot;validates_attachment_#{validation}&quot;</span>, <span class="ruby-identifier">:avatar</span>, <span class="ruby-identifier">options</span>)
          <span class="ruby-ivar">@dummy</span> = <span class="ruby-constant">Dummy</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">new</span>
        <span class="ruby-keyword kw">end</span>
        <span class="ruby-identifier">context</span> <span class="ruby-value str">&quot;and assigning nil&quot;</span> <span class="ruby-keyword kw">do</span>
          <span class="ruby-identifier">setup</span> <span class="ruby-keyword kw">do</span>
            <span class="ruby-ivar">@dummy</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">avatar</span> = <span class="ruby-keyword kw">nil</span>
            <span class="ruby-ivar">@dummy</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">valid?</span>
          <span class="ruby-keyword kw">end</span>
          <span class="ruby-keyword kw">if</span> <span class="ruby-identifier">validation</span> <span class="ruby-operator">==</span> <span class="ruby-identifier">:presence</span>
            <span class="ruby-identifier">should</span> <span class="ruby-value str">&quot;have an error on the attachment&quot;</span> <span class="ruby-keyword kw">do</span>
              <span class="ruby-identifier">assert</span> <span class="ruby-ivar">@dummy</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">errors</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">on</span>(<span class="ruby-identifier">:avatar_file_name</span>)
            <span class="ruby-keyword kw">end</span>
          <span class="ruby-keyword kw">else</span>
            <span class="ruby-identifier">should</span> <span class="ruby-value str">&quot;not have an error on the attachment&quot;</span> <span class="ruby-keyword kw">do</span>
              <span class="ruby-identifier">assert_nil</span> <span class="ruby-ivar">@dummy</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">errors</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">on</span>(<span class="ruby-identifier">:avatar_file_name</span>), <span class="ruby-ivar">@dummy</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">errors</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">full_messages</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">join</span>(<span class="ruby-value str">&quot;, &quot;</span>)
            <span class="ruby-keyword kw">end</span>
          <span class="ruby-keyword kw">end</span>
        <span class="ruby-keyword kw">end</span>
        <span class="ruby-identifier">context</span> <span class="ruby-value str">&quot;and assigned a valid file&quot;</span> <span class="ruby-keyword kw">do</span>
          <span class="ruby-identifier">setup</span> <span class="ruby-keyword kw">do</span>
            <span class="ruby-ivar">@dummy</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">avatar</span> = <span class="ruby-identifier">valid_file</span>
            <span class="ruby-ivar">@dummy</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">valid?</span>
          <span class="ruby-keyword kw">end</span>
          <span class="ruby-identifier">should</span> <span class="ruby-value str">&quot;not have an error when assigned a valid file&quot;</span> <span class="ruby-keyword kw">do</span>
            <span class="ruby-identifier">assert_equal</span> <span class="ruby-value">0</span>, <span class="ruby-ivar">@dummy</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">errors</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">length</span>, <span class="ruby-ivar">@dummy</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">errors</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">full_messages</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">join</span>(<span class="ruby-value str">&quot;, &quot;</span>)
          <span class="ruby-keyword kw">end</span>
        <span class="ruby-keyword kw">end</span>
        <span class="ruby-identifier">context</span> <span class="ruby-value str">&quot;and assigned an invalid file&quot;</span> <span class="ruby-keyword kw">do</span>
          <span class="ruby-identifier">setup</span> <span class="ruby-keyword kw">do</span>
            <span class="ruby-ivar">@dummy</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">avatar</span> = <span class="ruby-identifier">invalid_file</span>
            <span class="ruby-ivar">@dummy</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">valid?</span>
          <span class="ruby-keyword kw">end</span>
          <span class="ruby-identifier">should</span> <span class="ruby-value str">&quot;have an error when assigned a valid file&quot;</span> <span class="ruby-keyword kw">do</span>
            <span class="ruby-identifier">assert</span> <span class="ruby-ivar">@dummy</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">errors</span>.<span class="ruby-identifier">length</span> <span class="ruby-operator">&gt;</span> <span class="ruby-value">0</span>
          <span class="ruby-keyword kw">end</span>
        <span class="ruby-keyword kw">end</span>
      <span class="ruby-keyword kw">end</span>
    <span class="ruby-keyword kw">end</span></pre>
